column4: Howdy, I'm having trouble restarting compiz from a remote ssh connection, can anyone help?
compiz runs in a graphical environment, you'll need to forward or export your X display via the ssh connection to run it
I've used ssh -X & ssh -Y, also used xhost +<ip> to add authority... I get "invalid MIT-MAGIC-COOKIE-1 key"... am I starting compiz right with "DISPLAY=":0" compiz --replace"?
